title: worst customer support ever
body:
4 days ago my acccount got hacked, i asked for help in support, created ticket all that stuff, i get answer after a day to send "proof" that im owner of the account , so i sent my receipts , my credit card number (not all offcourse) , all the big , important details . after one day more, i get an answer and theres the moment i knew i wont see my account ever again. the messages says "I'll do my utmost to assist you with getting your account back but I need to complete the verification. To move forward with this recovery, further contextual information is necessary to verify ownership of the account. Please bear with me as I ask for the following information:

Do you still have access to the original email address ( i got hacked, no i dont have access)
**DATE OF BIRTH:**
so my question is how date of birth is more important then bank account numbers ? ( and i didnt had birth of date because when icreated this bs account i wrote nonsense and didnt think i will get hacked or even more, i will be asked about a birth date)
P.S. after 4 days of fighting i surrender, a normal human being would be more versatile in situation like this, but all i got was a big middle finger .

replies.body: my cousin had his account hacked into as well, and all the riot employee had to do was ask a couple simple questions such as "first champion you ever bought?" "first champion you ever played?" and yes of course the "date of birth?" question as well. just simply answer these questions honestly and as accurate as you can. don't blame the support for doing their job.

I know you've had a rough time getting your account back, and it's okay if you don't pass the first time around.  You can reach back out to our account team through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and try again.  We have to be stern on recovering account access, we don't want to just willy nilly it out to someone who might turn out to be the unauthorized user.  

All of these steps are for the security of your account, and we won't restore it unless we're absolutely sure it's going back to the owner.  Timethief offer some solid context, but really anything helps!  The more info you have to prove the account is yours, the quicker we can get it back into your hands.  Good luck!
Bank Info is something the Person who hacked you could have found Out. Specifics like the birthdate you used in the creation of the Account is something definetly only the OC can know
